chunk:
Botanicals Gentle Hydrating Mist

Brand: Botanicals

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Aqua, glycerine**, alcohol denat (grain alcohol)*, camellia sinesis leaf extract*, lavendula angustifolia (lavender) flower oil*, anthemis nobilis (chamomile) flower oil*, citrus nobilis (mandarin orange) peel oil*. Natural constituents of essential oils: Geraniol, limonene, linalool. (*Certified organic. **Natural origin.)
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
